Resized all the textures in the texture replacer default folder, went from crashing on endraxials textures, to loading all the way in without ATM, of course I added it anyways, for stability.

I so sorry, pls forgive me. Where should that link be put then?

Edited November 26, 2014 by drswagboss

none of the mods are mine, i did not make them, i do not own them.

So you should not upload them (without consent of the mod maker, and preferably only in his thread).
And here I was expecting something along the lines of switching to Geico...
drswagboss, you really need permission from all the addon authors for that download, and you need to supply the licenses, so no surprise that I have to remove it.
also this stuff should be put somewhere.. but not here!
ew, what happened to the 2k? Saturation overload?
I bet you'd notice if you were using a telescope mod

I bet you'd notice if you were using a telescope mod

Or just a high end gaming monitor. I'm certain I would notice right away. He is basically doing what ATM does but manually and I could notice when that mod was installed, the textures looked bad. I'd rather use less mods than make the game look so awful.
